name: Petunias Journey
description:
Play as Petunia as she goes on a very important mission to deliver a pie to Mr.Fisher. Be sure not to talk to your neighbours or you'll be late!

Made for Mini Jam 106: Frogs²

Made by Emily Austen (CarnalMantrap), and Artemis Austin (Artiethebeeboi)

Music by Prod. Riddiman "home"
